news.title: NOTICIAS DE POLYTOPIA
news.description:
Bienvenidos!
 Aqui es donde compartimos la noticias mas recientes del universo de Polytopia. Esta Atento!
gamemodepicker.title: MODO DE JUGAR
tribepicker.title: ESCOQUE SU TRIBU
tribepicker.categories.specialtribes.des: Un collection de tribus extranos, con maneras diferentes de jugar y abilidades especiales...
tribepicker.underconstruction.descriptio: Estamos al momento, construyendo este tribu. Creciendo frutas, creyiendo lenguas y architectura. Toma tiempo, saves. Follow @Midjiwan on Instagram or Twitter and you will be the first to know when new tribes arrive!
tribepicker.freetribe.description: Este tribu es gratis y no se puede comprar enable para jugar enlina.
tribepicker.disabled.description: Este tribu esta desactivado, ni tu o el computadora puede usar este tribu.
tribepicker.firstplayer: El primer jugador nesisita ser humano
gamesettings.title: Configuraciones del Juego
gamesettings.unlockmore: Discubre mas tribus para jugar con mas opponentes
gamesettings.createslot.error.info: Asegurate que estas enlina y atempta de nuevo.
gamesettings.online.disabled.info: Hay algunas cosas para resolver y areglar para jugar enlina

gamesettings.passplay.info: Juega con tus amigos localmente pasando la computadora cada ronda.
gamemode.perfection.description.button: Show your skills on the global leaderboards and attempt score the highest possible in this classic 30 turn gamemode.
gamemode.perfection.description: Get the highest possible score before the time runs out.
gamemode.perfection.win: Llegamos al fin del tiempo. La memoria de tu tribu se vivira para la eternidad!
gamemode.domination.description.button: Battle it out against all the other tribes in the classic free-for-all for control of the square. there is no time limit.
gamemode.domination.description: Elimina todo los otros tribus del mundo. Solo puede ser uno para domianar!
gamemode.domination.win: Has combatido todos los otros tribus y had unificado el mundo bajo tu tribu!
gamemode.domination.loss: Tu luntimo ciudad fue conquistado, su tribu y tu imperio fue eliminado.
gamemode.custom.description.button: Customize and set up the rules and the generation of the game and play however you like.
gamemode.custom.description: Juega en qualquer manera en este mundo de posobilidades infinitas.
gamemode.custom.win: You have defeated all the other tribes and unified the tribes of the square!
gamemode.custom.loss: Your last city was lost and your tribe conquered. you have been defeated.
gamemode.sandbox.description: Play however you want in a realm of infinite possibilities.
gamemode.glory.win: La meta de {0} puntos fue alcanzado!
gamemode.might.description: Captura todo los capitales para ganar
gamemode.death: Tu luntimo ciudad fue conquistado, su tribu y tu imperio fue eliminado.
world.intro.title: Lider Fuerte!
world.intro.text: You have been chosen to rule the {0} tribe. Explore the world and expand your empire, but watch out for other tribes as they try to overrun your's.
world.turn.end.question: Termina?
world.turn.nomoves: No mas movimientos posibles, termina la ronda?
world.turn.waiting.unknown: Esperando para un tribu desconocido para jugar...
world.unit.veteran: Este combatante es un veterano. Este combatante tiene mas salud.
world.unit.disembark.title: Salir de {0}?
world.unit.disembark.message: Saliendo de este vehiculo ditruyeda {0}. Queres sigir?
world.unit.evolve: Tu combatante had crecido en un {0}!
world.unit.evolve.title: Creciemnto del Comnatante
world.building.capture.ready: Cera listo para cptura el proximo ronda
world.building.capture.ready.title: Entrando a {0}!
world.building.capture.warning: si no los pares, su ciudad cera capurado el proximo ronda.
world.building.capture.warning.title: {0} esta bajo invasion!
world.attract.sanctuary: Su santuario had atratido un animal salvaje!
world.suggestion.title: Aque es un Consejo!
world.suggestion.disable: (Estos sugesiones pueden ser apagados en el menu)
world.road.connected.title: Nuevo ruta!
world.road.connected.message: {0} ahora esta connectado a tu capital!
world.tech.new.title: Nuevo Technologia!
world.reward.building: Ahora puedes constryir el {0}! Este monumento traera gloria y riquesa a la ciuda mas cercana.
world.reward.building.title: {0} fue construyido
tribes.xinxi.info:
el {0} comiensa en las montanas densas, alrededor de ellos hay hermosos arboles Xini.

los {0} comiensen el juego con la technologia de '{1}'.
tribes.imperius.info:
La tierra de Imperia con sus montanas grandes, valles verdes, y clima leve, es conocido para ser hogar del {0}, un tribu listo para extender su imperio al horizonte.

los {0} comiensen el juego con la technologia de '{1}'.
tribes.bardur.info:
Sobrevivir el invierno eternal de barduria no es nada facil, Pero aqui al {0} les encanta, Cortando los arboles de sus boques locales para construyir sus ciudades de madera.

los {0} comiensen el juego con la technologia de '{1}'.
tribes.oumaji.info:
The seemingly endless, sun blessed desert is the home of the {0} tribe.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech and a quick Rider.
tribes.kickoo.info:
Palmas grandes anda por todos lados de las playas blancas de este tierra, vendecido con su abundancia de pes y fruta. Bienvenidos al archipelago of Kickonesia, hogar del tribu tropical {0}. 

los {0} comiensen el juego con la technologia de '{1}'.
tribes.hoodrick.info:
The yellow autumn leaves of the {0} woods are perfect hideouts for its peculiar berry munching inhabitants, know for their fine pastry baking and expert archery skills.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech and a skilled Archer.
tribes.luxidoor.info:
The {0} love expensive things, jewels, rare spices and exclusive ornaments. That is also why they are the most expensive tribe in Polytopia!

Luxidoorian citizens lead very comfortable lives, draped in the finest purple silk. But will they survive outside of their beloved capital?  

{0} starts the game without a starting tech, but rather a large capital.
tribes.vengir.info:
Frowned upon by the other tribes and being pushed into the unpleasant wastelands, the {0} has over time, adapted to the harsh realities of their lives. Will they tolerate this injustice or rise to fight back seeking revenge? 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech and a powerful Swordsman.
tribes.zebasi.info:
The {0} have thrived living on the warm savannah, cultivating the rich soil to provide food for their mighty population. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.zebasi.news: All profits from the Zebasi tribe is invested in solar energy projects.
tribes.aimo.info:
The tranquil and wise {0} tribe inhabits the harshest, windiest, and highest mountain range of the square, where they have found inner peace by meditating in the eternal evening light. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.aquarion.info:
From the depths beneath oceans, the long lost {0} civilization arises from the crashing waves below, towering into the clear skies above!

Their extreme isolation has given them special aquatic abilities that are unknown to the other more human tribes and has allowed them to befriend the local marine life.

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech and have access to the unique amphibious units that no other tribe can train.
tribes.quetzali.info:
The {0} tribe worship the birb gods of the red soil and live in harmony with the natural symmetry of their cubistic jungles. They are commonly seen riding huge flightless birds. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech and a durable Defender.
tribes.elyrion.info:
The mysterious {0} defend their woodland homes with colorful magic and the ferocity of fire-breathing dragons! 

They regard Nature as a holy spirit and cannot hunt animals or chop down trees, instead they have the magical ability that turns regular animals into powerful monsters. 

{0} starts the game with the 'Forest Magic' tech and the power to enchant the local wildlife
tribes.yadakk.info:
The {0} started out as a nomadic tribe in the beautiful Khalee plains. Now that they managed to settle, they have now become are the traders of the square, connecting their empire with impressive trade routes. 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech.
tribes.polaris.info:
El tribu {0} had quedado atrapados en la tundra conjelada por siglos, Pero fuero vendicidos con la magia del extrano y extrateresrial Gaami con el poder para extender su terreno innaturalmente hieloso mas que lal clima permita. 

Con el poder de Toboganes y Mamoos, el mystical {0} so derterminos para entumbar el mundo en hielo y convertir la tierra en un paradiso frigido. 

los {0} comiensen el juego con la technologia de '{1}' y el poder de conjelar el terreno alrededor con moonis.
tribes.cymanti.info:
The {0} are a breakout group of Polytopians who moved into the unknown and learned to live with the Ciru Bug, which attaches to their faces and merges with their brains. 

Led by their Shaman, the {0} train gigantic bugs and use their enemies to fertilize their fungi farms, with the goal to vanquish all who would threaten their marshy home! 

{0} starts the game with the '{1}' tech and the power to boost units and unleash powerful, crippling poisons.
building.capital.owner.former: {0} is the former capital of the {1} empire, currently occupied by {2} forces
building.city.owner: {0} is a city in the {1} empire
building.village.owner: This is a village that doesn't belong to any tribe

building.resource: adds a {0} at the selected tile
building.ability.embark: Units that move here will turn into boats that can move on water.
building.ability.route: It creates trade routes through {0} to any other {1} within a 5 tiles radius.
building.ability.road: Build roads to connect cities with the capital. Connected cities get 1 population as a reward. Roads also give a movement bonus for all units on it.
building.ability.ruin: A ruin from an ancient civilization, it can contain valuable things! Go there with a unit to examine it.
building.ability.patina: {0} grows over time, so try to build them as early as possible.
building.ability.limited: You can only build one {0} per city.
building.ability.poison: This structure may inflict poisoning upon contact.
building.restriction.near: Must be built next to a {0}.
building.restriction.on: Must be on a tile with {0}.

tooltip.tile.capture.enemy: Your city is being captured by the enemy!

tooltip.tile.monuments: Monuments gives your empire extra score!
tooltip.tile.ruin: Move a unit here and examine these ancient ruins.
tooltip.tile.blocked: This resource is blocked by an enemy unit
tooltip.tile.extract.upgrade: Extract this resource to upgrade your city
tooltip.tile.extract.convert: This resource can be transformed into a unit
tooltip.tile.extract.stars: Extract this resource to earn stars instantly
tooltip.tile.extract.research: You need to research {0} to extract this resource
tooltip.tile.outside: This resource is outside of your empire
tooltip.tile.research: You need to research {0} to be able to move here
tooltip.tile.explore: Explore this area to see what it holds!
tooltip.unit.city.capture: Tap 'Capture' to add this city to your empire
tooltip.unit.city.capture.next: This city will be ready to capture next turn
tooltip.unit.actions.none: No actions left. Press 'Next Turn' to move this unit again.
tooltip.unit.actions.move: Click a blue mark to move.
tooltip.unit.actions.attack: Click a red mark to attack!
tooltip.unit.enemy.territory: This enemy is in your territory!
tooltip.unit.enemy.city: This enemy is capturing your city!
tooltip.unit.grow.now: Will grow to {0} at the end of this turn!
tooltip.unit.decay.now: This entity will decay at the end of this turn.
tooltip.unit.decay.later: This entity will decay in {0} turns.
tooltip.ability.disband: Release a unit in exchange for 50% of it's cost in stars.
tooltip.ability.destroy: Remove any building within your borders, great for restructuring your empire.
tooltip.ability.literacy: Reduce the price of all technologies by 33%.
tooltip.ability.glide: All units without the skate ability are granted a +1 movement bonus on ice.
tooltip.ability.dash: This unit is allowed to attack after moving in the same turn.
tooltip.ability.convert: This unit can convert enemy units to your tribe.
tooltip.ability.escape: This unit can retreat after attacking.
tooltip.ability.persist: This unit is allowed to attack again immediately after killing an enemy unit.
tooltip.ability.swim: This unit can move on water.
tooltip.ability.carry: This unit holds another unit inside of it.
tooltip.ability.heal: This unit can heal any surrounding allied units.
tooltip.ability.navigate: This unit can move in any aquatic terrain without needing the research to move there.
tooltip.ability.fly: This unit can fly over any terrain with no movement penalties or bonuse
tooltip.ability.splash: This unit's attack deals splash damage. Deals 50% of base damage or poisoning.
tooltip.ability.grow: This unit will eventually grow and become something else...
tooltip.ability.sneak: This unit can bypass enemy units without stopping.
tooltip.ability.scout: This unit has increased viewing range.
tooltip.ability.freeze: This unit unleashes a cryogenic attack that freezes its enemies when it attacks. the enemy unit cannot move while frozen.
tooltip.ability.freezearea: This unit can freeze any surrounding tiles and enemy units.
tooltip.ability.autofreeze: This unit can automatically freeze any surrounding tiles and any enemy units upon moving.
tooltip.ability.skate: This unit gets double movement on ice tiles, however on land the unit's movement is limited to 1 tile and other abilities are disabled.
tooltip.ability.fortify: This unit can recive a defence bonus when defending it's own cities.
tooltip.ability.creep: This unit can bypass terrain penalties without stopping.
tooltip.ability.explode: This unit can explode. the user instantlly faints and all enemy units nearby take 50% of it's HP in damage.
tooltip.ability.poison: This unit can inflict poison on an enemy. the enemy has reduced defences while poisoned.
tooltip.ability.independent: This unit doesnt use up a population slot or belongs to any city.
tooltip.ability.boost: This unit can increases the movement and attack of surrounding allied units.
tooltip.ability.eat: This unit grows in length whenever it kills its victim.
tooltip.ability.surprise: The unit that is being attacked by this unit, has it's retalitory attack disabled.

consent.approval.title: Welcome to Polytopia!
consent.approval.info: To improve Polytopia with usage statistics and to store your high scores and settings we need your approval to access to some personal data. You can read more about what data we collect in our privacy policy. (You can revoke your approval at any time in the 'Throne Room')
consent.enabled.info: You currently allow Polytopia to access some personal data to improve service and store your high scores etc. For more info, read our privacy policy.
consent.disabled.info: To save personal data like high scores and usage statistics we need you approval. For more info, read our privacy policy.

onlineview.profile.available: Profile is only available when connected to the server.
onlineview.friendlist.available: Friend List is only available when connected to the server.

onlineview.intro.fix:
Hi {0}! 

To play online multiplayer there are a few things you need to fix:
onlineview.intro.update: Online multiplayer is not available, please update Polytopia to the latest version
onlineview.nogames.start: Let's get some online games going with your friends. Tap 'New game' to start one.
onlineview.nogames.first: The first thing you need is to connect with some other humans who play Polytopia. Tap 'Friends' to add them.
onlineview.passplay.start: Start a local Pass & Play game by tapping 'New Game'
onlineview.login.ios.info: Using {0} ensures that you have a unique and persistent Player ID that will keep your data safe across devices.
onlineview.notifications.info: We use notifications to communicate the status of your ongoing multiplayer games.
onlineview.purchase.info: Running an online multiplayer service costs real money and we rely solely on the kind support from players like you.
onlineview.clipboard.title: Voilà!
onlineview.game.resign.title: Resign
onlineview.game.resign.info: Are you sure you want to leave this game permanently?
onlineview.game.old.title: Old file version
onlineview.game.old.info: This game was created with an outdated version of the game. It can unfortunately not be loaded :( My suggestion is that you delete it and start a new one. Sorry for the inconvenience.

credits.title: ABOUT
credits.subtitle: Indie Delight
credits.midjiwan:
The Battle of Polytopia is constantly being created by Midjiwan, a tiny indie game studio in Stockholm, Sweden.

 This custom language was made by Citillan, a Polytopian Linguist, Member of the Polaris tribe, and Inventor of the Polaris Language. Check out their work at https://github.com/Citillan-Mapping/. Enjoy!
credits.learnmore2: Check the extensive Wikia database created by the Polytopia community:
